summary: Most requested Open Architecture updates appear implemented: new /achievements route/page, public Connect page with direct contact registry, backend getContactInfo made public while admin updates remain restricted, Messaging Terminal post-submit mailto + copy workflow, home parallax/grid background, interactive product component cards, leadership roster update, and header/footer nav updates. Two notable gaps: Achievements tile text may not match the masterplan exact copy, and footer copyright is not the required fixed 2026 string (it is dynamic).

missing_requirements.requirement: Achievements page must display the four milestone titles and descriptions exactly as provided in the masterplan (spelling and punctuation preserved).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows an Achievements tile set, but since the masterplan exact text is not present in the BuildRequest and the implemented strings are specific, there is no evidence they match the required exact provided copy.

missing_requirements.requirement: Footer copyright line must match exactly: “© 2026 Tactic Transmit. All designs are the joint intellectual property of the Founders.”
missing_requirements.reason: Footer uses a dynamic year via `new Date().getFullYear()` and renders `© {currentYear} ...`, which will not always equal “© 2026 ...” exactly.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer includes a “Built with ♥ using caffeine.ai” attribution block and tracking URL construction (utm params).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any requirement; REQ-39 only specifies certain footer links, status indicators, and an exact copyright line.
